sentences.en: He muttered something ( to the salesgirl ) ( about losing his wallet ).
sentences.cn: 他低声 ( 向女售货员 ) 述说着 ( 他的钱包丢了 ).

sentences.en: I got a shock when the salesgirl punched up the total of my shopping.
sentences.cn: 当女售货员打出我买的东西的总额时,我吓了一跳.

sentences.en: S ( Salesgirl ): Good morning. Can I help you?
sentences.cn: 售货小姐 ) 早上好, 我能为你效劳 吗 ?

sentences.en: Salesgirl: Sir, gold prices surged past the $ 1 , 000 - an - ounce mark this Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 先生, 黄金价格在本周二急剧上升突破每盎司一千美元关卡.

sentences.en: Salesgirl: Yes. And it's also very popular with little children.
sentences.cn: 售货员: 小孩子也很喜欢这种娃娃的.

sentences.en: She counted out fifteen pence and passed it to the salesgirl.
sentences.cn: 她数出15个便士交给女店员.

sentences.en: Shopping in China: You pay . salesgirl says thank you.
sentences.cn: 在中国买东西: 交易完,卖方说谢谢.

sentences.en: The customer was angry with the salesgirl for her impolite answer.
sentences.cn: 那位顾客对女店员不客气的回答感到忿怒.

sentences.en: The manager rebuked salesgirl sharply for being rude to customers.
sentences.cn: 经理严厉斥责女售货员的对顾客无礼.

sentences.en: The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.
sentences.cn: 经理斥责新来的女售货员工作上粗心大意.

sentences.en: The new salesgirl is accurate at figures.
sentences.cn: 新来的女售货员计算正确无误.

sentences.en: The new salesgirl was read out of the shop.
sentences.cn: 新来的女售货员从商店开除了。

sentences.en: The young salesgirl rowed fiercely with the manager yesterday morning.
sentences.cn: 昨天上午这位年轻的女售货员与经理大吵大闹。

sentences.en: We have warned persons concerned, including salesgirl on the phone.
sentences.cn: 我们已警告有关职员, 包括那位态度恶劣的售货员.

sentences.en: We stipulate that our salesgirl must be polite to customer.
sentences.cn: 我们规定售货小姐们必须礼貌待客.

sentences.en: Well , you can just go and speak to the salesgirl there.
sentences.cn: 您可以去跟那儿的售货员讲.

sentences.en: Worked 21 hours weekly as a salesgirl at the bookstore of Shenzhen University. Earned 45％ of college expenses.
sentences.cn: 在深圳大学书店当售货员，每周工作21小时，赚了大学费用的45％。

sentences.en: Yes. I do. I worked as a salesgirl for P & G Company Ltd.
sentences.cn: 有过. 我曾经作为P & G公司的促销小姐.

trans.tran_en: a young woman who sells things in a shop
